name: More Than 2 Towers
description:
NOT MOBILE-FRIENDLY

This is a simple prototype for a tower defense game. You only have scouts and soldiers to defend, but, can we change that? In this game, you can combine your 2 towers to make new ones. 

Props to Mailchan for giving me the idea for this demo!

CONTROLS:

- Left-Click: Pick / Place a tower, Upgrade money / Firerate or Create a Truck.

- Right-Click: Cancel Tower-Selection.

- Mouse: The pointer is where all troops will shoot.

Put your mouse in the place you want your troops to shoot and last as long as possible!

For the moment, there's a limited amount of combinations you can make, and the enemy roaster, let me know if you want to see more of this!
